Html.content: Selecting Detail pages option from the create page dialog allows to create a new sitemap entry that is used as detail page for each instance of a specific content type or function, e.g., for news articles. So the content managers do not have to create a single sitemap entry for each content instance, e.g., all news articles are using the same page to be displayed. Detail pages are used to link from lists of contents, search results or teaser elements. The content gets displayed in a detail view enabled container that is marked as thus in the template JSP. A single news article can be accessed by an automatically generated URI, for example this URI can be built from the news Title property. Read more about the detail pages in section TODO:LINK Detail pages.
